name: Acl
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl
description:
Bucket Access Control List

Represents a Bucket’s Access Control List.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

methods.name: reload!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#reload!
methods.description: Reloads all Access Control List data for the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.reload!

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.owners.each { |owner| puts owner }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.writers.each { |writer| puts writer }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_owner "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_owner "group-#{email}"

params.name: entity
params.description:
The entity holding the permission, in one of the following forms:

  • user-userId
  • user-email
  • group-groupId
  • group-email
  • domain-domain
  • project-team-projectId
  • allUsers
  • allAuthenticatedUsers

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_writer "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_writer "group-#{email}"

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_reader "user-#{email}"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

params.description:
The entity holding the permission, in one of the following forms:

  • user-userId
  • user-email
  • group-groupId
  • group-email
  • domain-domain
  • project-team-projectId
  • allUsers
  • allAuthenticatedUsers

methods.name: delete
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#delete
methods.description: Permanently deletes the entity from the bucket’s access control list.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.delete "user-#{email}"

params.name: entity
params.description:
The entity holding the permission, in one of the following forms:

  • user-userId
  • user-email
  • group-groupId
  • group-email
  • domain-domain
  • project-team-projectId
  • allUsers
  • allAuthenticatedUsers

methods.name: auth!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#auth!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the authenticatedRead predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.auth!

methods.name: private!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#private!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the private predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.private!

methods.name: project_private!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#project_private!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the projectPrivate predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.project_private!

methods.name: public!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#public!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the publicRead predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.public!

methods.name: public_write!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
Acl#public_write!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the publicReadWrite predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.public_write!
